name: confctl
short_description:
Confctl is a tool designed for easy access to configuration files in C-like syntax from shell scripts.  It allows for both reading and setting variables, and preserves formatting and comments in the modified files.

BSD license, no dependencies.
summary: Tool designed for easy access to configuration files in C-like syntax

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: BSD License

Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: Developers
